name: RetrieveMiroAppCardInfo
description:
Retrieve information for a specific Miro app card.

This tool retrieves details about an app card item on a Miro board, requiring 'boards:read' scope. It's useful for getting detailed information about app cards on a board to display or process further.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Miro board for retrieving a specific app card item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a specific item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the app card item to retrieve from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve.
